summary: Aureftir has been sealed off for many years. Very few have set foot past the gate. Those who have...never made their way out.
descriptionHtml:
WHAT IT IS: 

Aureftir has been sealed off for many years. Very few have set foot past the gate. Those who have...never made their way out. 

WHERE YOU CAN FIND IT: 

Aureftir can be found in the mountains north of Riften. Follow the path near Tolvald\'s Cave southeast into the mountains until you reach the steps. See the screenshots above for the exact location. 

As always, let me know if you run into any issues and I\'ll do my best to fix them. Any feedback is appreciated! 

NO DLC REQUIRED 

Please endorse if you enjoy! 

Also available on the Steam Workshop.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
MY MODS: 

-Havalden\'s Abode 
-Gravkammir 
-Aureftir
author: BraynFreeze
